meanings.definition: The plural form of nasopharynx, the upper part of the pharynx connecting with the nasal cavity above the soft palate.
meanings.sent1: Doctors examined the nasopharynxes of the patients to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: The ENT specialist focused on the nasopharynxes during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The choir members joked that their nasopharynxes were in perfect harmony during the performance.
meanings.sent4: The interconnected nasopharynxes of the siblings symbolized their strong bond.
meanings.sent5: In the anatomy class, students learned about the intricate structure of nasopharynxes.
